entry.title: Movie: Kagemusha, directed by Akira Kurosawa (1980)
entry.content: This is the second Kurosawa film that I've seen. I thought it was done very well and the story was incredibly interesting, but definitely not exciting. It was well acted. A lot of the movie went on too long. The battle scenes are very long and drag without much interesting stuff going on. Additionally, there are a few "psychedelic" scenes that really date the movie. All that aside, I think it was pretty cool.
